text:
[Verse]
Sunset in the sky tonight
Colors fade and stars ignite
Walking hand in hand so free
Whispers of eternity

[Verse 2]
Beach waves crashing at our feet
Golden light our hearts deplete
Softly hum a sweet old tune
Beneath the rising moon

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams we're flying high
Underneath the velvet sky
Hold me close don't let it end
In this moment let's pretend

[Verse 3]
Laughter echoes through the night
Every worry out of sight
Lost in time just you and me
In this sunset fantasy

[Bridge]
Stars are twinkling in your eyes
Like a million fireflies
Let the night sweep us away
In this dance we'll forever stay

[Verse 4]
Morning comes but let's not care
Sunset memories we share
Keep this feeling close and tight
Dreaming 'til the morning light
title: Sunset Dreams
